argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cnnv.6 | |- U = <. <. + , x. >. , abs >. |
| 2 |  | #P_cnaddablo | |- + e. AbelOp |
| 3 |  | #P_ablogrpo | |- ( + e. AbelOp -> + e. GrpOp ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_ax-mp | |- + e. GrpOp |
| 5 |  | #P_axaddf | |- + : ( CC X. CC ) --> CC |
| 6 | 5 | #P_fdmi | |- dom + = ( CC X. CC ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_grporn | |- CC = ran + |
| 8 |  | #P_cnid | |- 0 = ( GId ` + ) |
| 9 |  | #P_cncvc | |- <. + , x. >. e. CVecOLD |
| 10 |  | #P_absf | |- abs : CC --> RR |
| 11 |  | #P_abs00 | |- ( x e. CC -> ( ( abs ` x ) = 0 <-> x = 0 ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_biimpa | |- ( ( x e. CC /\ ( abs ` x ) = 0 ) -> x = 0 ) |
| 13 |  | #P_absmul | |- ( ( y e. CC /\ x e. CC ) -> ( abs ` ( y x. x ) ) = ( ( abs ` y ) x. ( abs ` x ) ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_abstri | |- ( ( x e. CC /\ y e. CC ) -> ( abs ` ( x + y ) ) <_ ( ( abs ` x ) + ( abs ` y ) ) ) |
| 15 | 7, 8, 9, 10, 12, 13, 14, 1 | #P_isnvi | |- U e. NrmCVec |
